page.shortlink: api namespace Active Directory Group ActiveDirectory Group
page.description: The WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Group object contains properties and methods available for working with an Active Directory group.

property.name: Name
property.description: Name is the name of the Active Directory group. Read Only.

property.name: Description
property.description: Description is the description of the Active Directory group. Read Only.

property.name: DistinguishedName
property.description: DistinguishedName is the LDAP distinguished name of the group. Read Only.

property.name: Sid
property.description: Sid is the Windows security id of the group. Read Only.

property.name: DisplayName
property.description: DisplayName is the friendly of the group. Read Only.

property.name: SamAccountName
property.description: SamAccountName is the SAM account name for the group. Read Only

property.name: Users
property.description: An array of users that belong to the group.

property.name: UserNames
property.description: UserNames is a *[link:crlf@CRLF Function]* delimited list of the names of users in the group. Read Only.
